Charles Kwamina Tachie bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana bụrụkwa onye omeiwu nke mpaghara Tarkwa na ụlọ omeiwu nke mbụ nke mba nke abụọ nke Ghana.
A mụrụ Tachie n'afọ 1920. Ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Roman Katọlik nke Tarkwa.
Tachie rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye nlekọta ọrụ. Ọ bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego.
A họpụtara Tachie ka ọ bụrụ onye omeiwu ka ọ nọchite anya mpaghara Tarkwa n'ụlọomeiwu nke mbụ nke mba Ghana nke abụọ.Ghan anian nzuko omeiwu
A họpụtara Tachie na vootu 4,197 n'ime vootu 8,477 zuru oke
A họpụtara ya na tiketi nke Progress Party
A họpụtara ya karịa Rowland Atta Kesson nke National Alliance of Liberals na Christian Buah Olivet-Ackim nke People's Action Party
Ndị a nwetara 1,155 na 3,125 n'otu n'otu nke ngụkọta vootu ziri ezi.
